title: Looking for regular flex team
body:
Now that I'm finished coaching for the split 
I'd like to find a group of players to play with who want to play flex queue as 5 regularly.
Been playing since season 2 and have been coaching teams professionally for last 4 years. (OCS and OPL)

Hit me up in game if you are interested: Crimson Drak
Support main (all of them) (Plat-ish level just starting to play more again)
and can off role if preferred. (~gold level)
